sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react'; import {Form,Button, Container,Row,Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {Link,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; function AutoScreen({formData,setFormData}){ return (
Email: setFormData({...formData,email:e.target.value}))} name="Email" placeholder='Email'/> Password: setFormData({...formData,password:e.target.value})} name='password' placeholder='Password'/> Don't have an account? Sign up
) } export default AutoScreen;
